articles.title: Tesco worker dies after covid outbreak at Maryhill store - Glasgow Live
articles.description: A number of staff at the Tesco Extra have tested positive for the virus.
articles.content:
A Tesco worker has died following a covid outbreak at a Glasgow store.
A member of staff at the Maryhill Tesco Extra passed away after contracting the virus. He is believed to have been in his early… [+1243 chars]
